documentType.description: A classification of the document described

url.description: A direct link to the document or attachment.

datePublished.description: The date on which the document was first published.

criteria.description: A list of criteria on which either bidders or items will be judged, evaluated or assessed.

expectedValue.example: Can be other type: number, integer, boolean

enquiryPeriod.description: The period during which potential bidders may submit enquiries for clarification.

url.description: A direct link to the document or attachment.

datePublished.description: The date on which the document was first published.

submissionMethod.description: The methods by which bids are submitted

submissionMethodDetails.description: Any detailed or further information on the submission method.

secondStage.description: Describes the second stage of a two-stage procedure.It has two fields to describe the limits on the number of candidates to be invited.
